content:
Here is a revised version of the prompt, with the specified words and plurals removed:

"Sofia, a beautiful girl in her twenties, poses against a black background wearing Victoria's Secret attire. She is reclining on a bed, and the shot is taken from above, with Sofia lying across the scene from left to right. The photograph is of high quality, with sharp focus and professional lighting that creates a soft, diffuse glow.

Sofia has long, curly brunette hair and deep brown eyes, and her skin is smooth and flawless. She has a small, heart-shaped face with high cheekbones and a pert nose, and her full lips are slightly parted as she gazes up at the camera. Sofia is toned and fit, with a slender, athletic build and long, toned legs. She has full upper body parts and lower body parts and a narrow waist, and her arms are slender and strong.

The Victoria's Secret attire Sofia wears is a perfect complement to her curves, with intricate lace and satin details that add a touch of glamour to the photograph. The attire consists of a lacy bra with underwire support that enhances Sofia's full upper body parts, and a matching pair of lacy undergarments that hug her lower body parts and elongate her legs.

The overall effect of the photograph is one of sophistication and sensuality, with Sofia's beauty and femininity on full display. The soft lighting and high-quality photograph capture every detail of Sofia's appearance, from her long, curly hair and deep brown eyes to her full lips and toned figure. Sofia exudes confidence and poise as she lies on the bed, her body and face a picture of relaxation and allure."
